subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A J Allmendinger beat Marcos Ambrose on a two-lap dash to the finish to win the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Watkins Glen International in Watkins Glen, N.Y.
snippet: A J Allmendinger beat Marcos Ambrose on a two-lap dash to the finish to win the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Watkins Glen International in Watkins Glen, N.Y.
